title: YES!!! VICTORIOUS REK'SAI!!!!!!! (IN YOUR DREAMS!!!)
body:
SO i found out the victorious skin this season is maokai. Just a really binary champ to play that i would sleep on. Out of all the better choices to chose from, maokai was picked. What the actual fuck???

Now im not too worried to fight for gold and not get it by end of season.

Just to list a few examples, Victorious reksai would be a lot cooler! What about darius and irelia? Gankplank? ekko?  Victorious rengar would be awesome too!

If there's anyway this skin can be redone that would be great!

replies.body: It's gonna look stale like victorious sivir
Yo what? I really like Victorious Sivir :(
Me too! She actually looks like a warrior in that skin, as opposed to some big boobed princess you would find on an ad saying "Your wife will hate this game"

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=igQgsdeE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-03T23:16:09.502+0000)
>
> Yo what? I really like Victorious Sivir :(

Pax and snow and warden look nice for me  

That skin gives me motion sickness look at the spinning q  xD
(It just doesn't feel victorious)

Victorius skins are picked based on performance not who is most liked. Think the MVP of champions. Darius Irelia and GP do not qualify as they did not influence the game as much as Maokai. GP had some influence but not so much. Mao hovered around 60-80% pb rate on summer split depending on region so i can see some reason for him. 

But i FNCly agree that Mao was far from the top spot. You noticed that i didnt mention Ekko before? Thats because i beleive he should have gotten the skin. He was the champion that got the most influence in the game throught both splits. But after some junglers and supports that are out because we need some diversity in skins, we would have 3 of support/jungler if one got. FYI my picks before ekko would be Nida(almost 100% pb rate both splits, thats insane but got challenger already), Karma (highly contested both splits but she is support) and Rektsai (jungler so out). Elise would be another contester if she already had not got one.

Imo champions that surpassed Maokai's performance this year are:
Top:  Ekko Gnar
Jungle: Nida, Rektsai, Elise, Graves
Mid: Victor, Vlad, Ryze
Adc: Ashe, Jhin (mostly for utility, same deal as SIvir)
Supports: Karma by far
There are more but cant think them now and they are close to Mao, but the above surpassed him by a noticable margin. Still without support and jungler i can still see 7 clear picks before him.
Viktorious Viktor would be the best..

> [{quoted}](name=JanDismasZelenka,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=igQgsdeE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-03T21:59:26.191+0000)
>
> Viktorious Viktor would be the best..

Same it would save me 1350 rp 
Guess I have no choice x)

Yah LET THE NUMBERS speak! Every youtube video i saw complained about this. And almost everyone on boards dislike it. He just doesn't qualify for victorious.

Early season victorious skins were actually on LIKABLE champs who had impact throughout season. VICTORIOUS Janna, Jarvan, Elise, and Morgana were all good, even if u dont main the champ most people were fine with it. Than it all went downhill since last season. Sivir? really? i dont even see people play vic sivir this whole season cuz its that bad. AND NOW MAOKAI? Im laughing so hard haha!

Jokes aside, Sivir and Kallista were the utility adcs that enabled the rundown/pick comps focused on juggernaits. While the later could be subed with another, Sivir and Kallista were valuable picks. They had high priority throught the S5. So one got the championship, the other the Victorius. They both earned it. Its the same deal with S2 Janna in the adc meta. While not being the main force, she enabled the main force.

Thats without saying that i found 10 champs better suited than Maokai this year.

Actually Sivir was an extremely influential pick early last season. She just wasn't popular in worlds, but by the time worlds is around the skin is likely finished, so it's not like they can back out last minute.
maokai's skills have great room to have amazing particles and effects :( it's gonna be a good skin guys
Why are you guys complaining?? IT IS FREE!!!!! Just take it and shut up.
